ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
This module provides:
- a function that raises an exception in another thread, including the
main thread.
- two context managers that may stop its inner block activity on timeout.
- two decorators that may stop its decorated callables on timeout.
about.summary:
Raise asynchronous exceptions in other thread, control the timeout of
blocks or callables with a context manager or a decorator

about.description:
This module provides:
- a function that raises an exception in another thread, including the
main thread.
- two context managers that may stop its inner block activity on timeout.
- two decorators that may stop its decorated callables on timeout.
about.summary:
Raise asynchronous exceptions in other thread, control the timeout of
blocks or callables with a context manager or a decorator

name: stopit
raw_meta_yaml:
# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prefix-dev/recipe-format/main/schema.json
schema_version: 1

context:
  version: "1.1.2"
  python_check_max: "3.14"

package:
  name: stopit
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  - target_directory: dist
    url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/s/stopit/stopit-${{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: f7f39c583fd92027bd9d06127b259aee7a5b7945c1f1fa56263811e1e766996d
  - target_directory: src
    url: https://github.com/glenfant/stopit/archive/refs/tags/${{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: df619f61469765aad691bc3dcaf0d4bae1fd4611120bd4a74e72f568ee7d8424

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: python
  script:
    - cd dist
    - ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation --disable-pip-version-check

requirements:
  host:
    - python ${{ python_min }}.*
    - setuptools
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=${{ python_min }}
    # uses `pkg_resources`, removed in 82.0.0
    - setuptools <82.0.0

tests:
  - python:
      imports: stopit
      pip_check: true
      python_version:
        - ${{ python_min }}.*
        - ${{ python_check_max }}.*
  - files:
      source:
        - src/tests.py
        - src/README.rst
    requirements:
      run:
        - coverage
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
    script:
      - cd src
      - coverage run --source=stopit --branch tests.py
      - coverage report --show-missing --skip-covered --fail-under=82

about:
  license: MIT
  license_file: src/LICENSE
  summary: |
    Raise asynchronous exceptions in other thread, control the timeout of
    blocks or callables with a context manager or a decorator
  description: |
    This module provides:
    - a function that raises an exception in another thread, including the
    main thread.
    - two context managers that may stop its inner block activity on timeout.
    - two decorators that may stop its decorated callables on timeout.
  homepage: https://pypi.org/pypi/stopit
  repository: https://github.com/glenfant/stopit

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl
